summary:
My Blondies Pamella Paa and Patrizzia Par.
With 7B Body and optional UnpB, ADEC and CBBE Body.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/CtH8pAA.jpg[/img][font=Georgia][color=#f9cb9c][size=4][i][b]
These are my 2 Imperial Girls with the great Seven Base Body.Optional with UNPB, ADEC and CBBE Body.[/b][/i][/size][/color][/font]

[font=Georgia][size=3][b][i][color=SandyBrown]Location:[/color][/i][/b][/size][/font]
[font=Georgia][size=3][b][i][color=Sienna]Pamella Paa-one Handed Warrior/Levl.8: You find Pamella in Whiterun,Dragonsreach.[/color][/i][/b][/size][/font]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/pBXUZhI.jpg[/img][font=Georgia][size=3][b]
[i][color=Sienna]Patrizzia Par-Imperial Witchblade/Levl.8:You find Patrizzia in Whiterun,Dragonsreach.[/color][/i][/b][/size][/font]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/aipzdLA.jpg[/img]


[img]http://i.imgur.com/DV42sPX.jpg[/img]
[font=Georgia][size=3][b][i][color=SandyBrown]ADEC[/color][/i][/b][/size][/font]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Rafipt4.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bV82Tz9.jpg[/img]
[font=Georgia][size=3][b][i][color=SandyBrown]CBBE[/color][/i][/b][/size][/font]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/nZEev9E.jpg[/img]
[font=Georgia][color=#e69138][size=3][b][i]7Base[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font]



[font=Georgia][size=4][b][i][color=Sienna]Requirements:[/color][/i][/b][/size][/font]
[font=Georgia][size=3][b][i][color=SandyBrown]ApachiiSkyHairFemale1_3 by Apachii[/color][/i]

[i][color=SandyBrown]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by xp32[/color][/i][/b][/size][/font]


[font=Georgia][color=#B45F06][size=3][i][b]YOU NEED THIS OR ELSE YOU WILL CRASH TO THE DESKTOP!!![/b][/i][/size][/color][/font]

[font=Georgia][size=3][i][b][color=DarkOrange]Does not replace anything in Game!![/color][/b][/i][/size][/font]


[font=Georgia][size=3][b][i][color=Sienna]Mods that I use for the Female Followers:[/color][/i][/b][/size][/font]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3666//?]FemFeet by Phygit[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36992/?]SeveNBase a custom FemaleBodyReplacer by Crosscrusade DeMoNhUnTeR1986 Sevennity[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20227/?]TroubleMakers Clothing UNPB also BBP and BBPx - UNPB Body Main Page by MrTroubleMaker[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5390/?]Acdale EyeCandy Body ADEC now TBBP Compatible by AcDale[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4888/?]CHSBHC - BBP - Nude and Jiggly Mod by CherryHotaling[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Calientes Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- by Caliente[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28946/?]Sporty Sexy Sweat - wet body skin texture - CBBE UNP UNPB ADEC Vanilla by Xs2reality[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13377/?]Sporty Sexy Map - Athletic muscle mod CBBE UNP UNPB ADEC by Xs2reality[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4686/?]CBBE-CHSBHC-UNP-ADEC-Human Argonian Khajiit Texture-4096 by AnTiWoMaAgNoT[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24318/?]Barbarian and Milkdrinker Skin UNP and UNPB by HoneyVanity[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures Renewal by Hello Santa[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by xp32[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812/?]Better Females by Bella by BellaGail[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27783/?]HN66s Long Eye Lashes by humannature66[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31665/?]Better Makeup for SKSE by Diethardt[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34160/?]Sexy Vanilla Female Armor for UNP and SevenBase with BBP by Crosscrusade[/url]


[i][color=Sienna][size=3][b][font=Georgia]Manually Installation:[/font]
[font=Georgia][color=#f6b26b]Copy the ESP, Meshes and Textures-Folder
and paste it in your Data- Folder,
and confirm to overwrite if you already
have a Meshes and Textures Folder there[/color][/font][/b][/size][/color][/i]


[font=Georgia][size=4][b][i][color=DarkOrange]Special Thanks to my Friends:[/color][/i][/b][/size][/font]
